In Virginia, anti-abortion activists and social conservatives said the videos illustrate what they said is Planned Parenthood's disregard of laws intended to regulate abortion. Their clinics are just blatantly violating laws, and they're doing it to the sums of hundreds of millions of dollars of taxpayer funds, said Anna Franzonello, an attorney for Americans United For Life. .`` In deciding who should take the business forward, we wanted someone with the right mix of leadership, vision and hard-core engineering chops,'' Steve Ballmer said in an e-mail to all employees Wednesday. We wanted someone who could define the future of business computing and further expand our ability to bring the cloud to business customers and developers in game-changing ways. Steve Ballmer also said in his e-mail that Amithabh Srivastava, a senior vice president for Server and Tools who seemed the heir apparent, is leaving. It's unclear where Srivastava will go next. legislator Chris Bryant , who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Chris Bryant said the police had`` severely'' damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. MENTAL

Former Republican state Rahm Emanuel Jackie Walorski , a tea party favorite who narrowly lost her race last year against Democratic Rahm Emanuel Joe Donnelly in northern Indiana, said she was excited by the prospect of Mike Pence running for governor. I think he's the clear frontrunner and I think the race is his if he chooses to accept it, Jackie Walorski said.`` I think he'd clear the field.''
